steps: UTG opens 2.3 bb (typical online), BTN calls, blinds fold
Flop K72r: UTG cbet_small, BTN calls
Turn A two_tone: UTG bet_big_turn to pressure Kx and draws
BTN folds to the second barrel
Flop T84 two_tone: CO cbet_small, BB calls
Turn 2 bricks: CO check_back with medium pair to control
River plan: evaluate thin_value or check behind
Turn Q: BTN delay_cbet small to deny equity and set up river
SB calls; river sizing follows pot geometry plan
